column4: are there any known issues with upgrading to dapper from breezy?
when you repartition, give yourself a separate partition for /home
so next time you can reinstall the OS, without touching your data
it's not mounted.  I'm in a live session.
did you remove the partition above /home?
resize option should give you a slider you can push to the right
it only moves to the left.
I see no free space there - which partition is /home?
see how the extended partition finishes at 21342?
oh, ok.  Forgot about the extended partion.
